data.eml:eml: Description of seven new species in the genus Diptacus Keifer (Acari: Eriophyoidea: Diptilomiopidae: Diptilomiopinae) from northwestern China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Song, Zi-Wei, Xue, Xiao-Feng, Hong, Xiao-Yue (2007): Description of seven new species in the genus Diptacus Keifer (Acari: Eriophyoidea: Diptilomiopidae: Diptilomiopinae) from northwestern China. Zootaxa 1429: 39-53, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.175781
